item.title: Chain of Responsibility Design Pattern in C#
item.description: In this article, we will talk about the Chain of Responsibility Design Pattern. We are going to see how to implement this pattern in C# and how it can solve certain design problems. Let’s start. What is The Chain of Responsibility Design Pattern? Chain of Responsibility is a behavioral pattern that helps us design a […] The post Chain of Responsibility Design Pattern in C# appeared first on Code Maze.

item.title: How to Connect a SQLite Database to EF Core
item.description: In this article, we’ll discuss connecting a SQLite database to an ASP.NET Core Web API using EF Core. So, let’s get going. Introduction to SQLite SQLite is a compact and efficient relational database management system that can be embedded directly into applications. The entire database is self-contained in a single disk file. As a result, […] The post How to Connect a SQLite Database to EF Core appeared first on Code Maze.
